product_name: Lakeshore Mr. Toad's Wild Ride Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard - Kids' - 8' 6"
long_description: The Lakeshore Mr. Toad's Wild Ride Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard is a perfect size for kids under 125 lbs. and can be packed up into a small backpack for easy transport. Inflatable board offers extremely high air pressure for performance that rivals the qualities of a hard board. 26 in. width offers plenty of stability for pint-size paddlers to grow in confidence. Soft deck pad offers grip underfoot, and front bungees offer storage for small items.
short_description: The Lakeshore Mr. Toad's Wild Ride Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard is a perfect size for kids under 125 lbs. and can be packed up into a small backpack for easy transport.
